description: Inspired by the original Rebelstar from 1986 and in parts UFO: Enemy Unknown / X-COM: UFO Defense, you may want to take a look at Archrebel Tactics if you like your strategy games with a retro look and feel.
title: Archrebel Tactics is a wild sci-fi turn-based strategy game inspired by Rebelstar and X-COM

description: Battle Train sounds unique and hilarious! You've seen plenty of deck-builders, but instead of various creatures, here you throw trains at your enemy.
title: Battle Train is a deck-builder where you throw trains at your enemy

description: If you're looking forward to 7 Days to Die finally hitting the big 1.0 release, now you can try it a little early with an experimental Beta release.
title: 7 Days to Die gets an experimental Beta for the 1.0 release

description: After a delay, Paradox Interactive have now launched the first proper major expansion for Victoria 3 with Sphere of Influence along with the free Update 1.7 "Kahwah".
title: Victoria 3's first major expansion Sphere of Influence is out now

description: A sale I missed that started last week you might want to jump in and find some big discounts in the Fanatical Red Hot Sale which goes on all this week too!
title: Fanatical's Red Hot Sale has thousands of great games for cheap

description: Terra Nil is a wonderful reverse-builder, where instead of building a city you're restoring the environment from a wasteland to a successful green ecosystem and the latest free update is a big one.
title: The Vita Nova update for Terra Nil is out now bringing an overhaul to animals

description: Everafter Falls from SquareHusky and Akupara Games has now released on Steam, along with Native Linux support following a successful Kickstarter back in 2020.
title: Cute farming life sim Everafter Falls is out now

description: With a demo available on Steam and Native Linux support, Counterpick Labs looks like a fun addition to the platform fighter genre and it's going to be free too.
title: Mix and match quirky weapons and gadgets to build your perfect fighter in Counterpick Labs
